songs.title: The Draw
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
In my left hand
There is the familiar
In my right hand
There's the great unknown

I can see the
Madly different grass there
But I'm drawn to
Wilder nights at home

[Pre-Chorus]
Don't listen to your friends
See the despair behind their eyes
Don't listen to your friends
They only care and want to know why

[Chorus 1]
I can feel the draw, I can feel it pulling me back
It's pulling me back, it's pulling me
I can feel the draw, I can feel it pulling me back
It's pulling me back, it's pulling me

[Verse 2]
Are you drifting
Way beyond what's normal?
'Cause 'round your mind rings
The words that they would say

When you go home
Everything looks different
And you're scared of
Being left behind

[Pre-Chorus]
Just listen to your friends
Trust that they're fair, look in their eyes
Just listen to your friends
They only care and hope you're alright

[Chorus 1]
I can feel the draw, I can feel it pulling me back
It's pulling me back, it's pulling me
I can feel the draw, I can feel it pulling me back
It's pulling me back, it's pulling me

[Ad lib]

[Chorus 1]
I can feel the draw, I can feel it pulling me back
It's pulling me back, it's pulling me
I can feel the draw, I can feel it pulling me back
It's pulling me back, it's pulling me

[Chorus 1]
I can feel the draw, I can feel it pulling me back
It's pulling me back, it's pulling me
I can feel the draw, I can feel it pulling me back
It's pulling me back, it's pulling me

[Chorus 2]
I can feel the draw, I can feel it pulling me back
It's pulling me back, it's pulling me
I can feel the draw, the draw
The draw, the draw
